channel.title: Compiler error

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Mattshi96 Mattshi96
item.description:
@Mattshi96 wrote:

will some please tell me what the problem is i went over this multiple times and cannot see it. my code is:
If(command.startsWith(“cash”) && pkPoints > 100) {
pkPoints -= 100;
addItem(995, 10000000);
sM("@blu@You have spent 100 points on 10000000 coins.");
sM("@blu@You now have " +pkPoints+ " points!");
i get the error: ‘;’ expected
if(command.startsWith(“cash”) && pkPoints > 100) {
^
1 error
Press any key to continue…

MOD delete never mind i figured it out.

Read full topic
